Besides debate low fat low carbohydrate diet , focus food group include fruit , vegetable low fat dairy diet may helpful weight maintenance . However , energy intake key factor weight maintenance . There several study show beneficial effect low energy density diet weight reduction . However , study discuses regard effect diet weight maintenance .
